body:
Comment 2: 
Neither oversight nor dropped. The release notes are not complete. Far from it: they
make no attempt to describe bug fixes, only language changes, API changes, and major
performance-related changes.

We need to draw the line somewhere, and this issue falls on the wrong side. Completists
can check the Mercurial logs.
_Labels changed: removed **go1.1**._ _Status changed to **WorkingAsIntended**._
